definition[0]: a stick or handle on a machine or piece of equipment, that you move to operate it
example[0]: Pull this lever to open the gate.
definition[1]: a long thin piece of metal that you use to lift something heavy by putting one end under the object and pushing the other end down
definition[2]: something you use to influence a situation to get the result that you want
example[1]: Rich countries use foreign aid as a lever to achieve political aims.
definition[3]: to move something with a lever
example[2]: He levered the stone into place.
definition[4]: to make someone leave a particular job, situation etc
example[3]: Theyâ€™re trying to lever him out of his job.
